page.title: 05Adrian's Home
page.content: My house is about 17 years old and I live at 14,Oak Drive,Seisdon.There is a new housing estate just down the road. It is roughly one mile from school. It is detached and built of brick. The site was a field before. We have a garage which can hold two cars and some gardening equipment.There are four bedrooms,a playroom,a kitchen, living room,three toilets and two bathrooms. My dad is a Dental Surgeon. We have two dogs who are brothers and are 7 years old. I have 5 fish in a fairly big pond. On a school day I get up at 7-40 a.m. dress and go downstairs to have some breakfast. I brush my teeth and set off for school. I usually go by car. We always start with mental arithmetic.
